price: Ariko baramuhinyuye, maze turamurokora, we n’abari kumwe na we mu nkuge, nuko turoha abahinyuye ibimenyetso byacu. Mu by’ukuri bari abantu bahumye (batabona ukuri).
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-anjaynāhu wa-alladhīna maʿahu fī al-ful'ki wa-aghraqnā alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā innahum kānū qawman ʿamīna
